[h1]Eines der besten Spiele[/h1]

Portal 1 hat schon durch seine neue Idee und die cleveren Puzzle in Kombination mit einer guten und lustigen Geschichte überzeugt und ist ein absoluter Klassiker. 

Portal 2 setzt das gekonnt fort und fügt dem noch einiges hinzu:

[list]
[*]eine wesentlich längere Spieldauer
  [*]neue Tools und Rätsel-Konzepte
  [*]faszinierende Atmosphäre und abwechlungsreiches Level-Design
  [*]sehr hoher Wiederspielwert
  [*]brilliantes Voice-acting von Stephen Merchant (Wheatley)
[/list]

Portal 2 ist eines der unterhaltsamsten Spiele mit einem perfekten Mix aus Herausforderung, Story und Spass.
if you havent ruined your friends day by removing their portals or sending them to their impending doom you should try to refund this

The comunity is still alive and multiple mods are available to alow you to continue playing these consit of Portal stories: mel, Apeture tag and a variety more on ModDB.  A definate recomondation from me 100% a good game.

Bu oyuna kelimeler yetmez aslında... Kendisi benim için en özel oyunlardan birisi.

Bu oyunu ilk kez 2014'ün sonlarında öğrenmiştim abim kendi Steam hesabında almıştı, onun hesabında ilk kez oynadığımda bir şey anlamamıştım çünkü sayın değer abim oynamış oyunu, bende Bölüm 3 den başlamıştım. Bende ne yaptım tabiki Bölüm 1 den başlamıştım. O zamanlar oyunu bitirmem bir uzun sürdü, hem benim aptal beynim yüzünden hemde arkadaşlarımla vakit geçirmem olmuştu o zamanlar onlarda Portal 2 yoktu. İtiraf bile ediyorum zamanında bazı geçemediğim testleri YouTube dan bakmıştım. Ayrıca bu oyunu Portal 1'i bilmeden önce oynadım o yüzden GLaDOS un başta kim olduğunu bile bilememiştim. Ama eğlencelimiydi? Hemde nasıl. 

Oyun aslında her konudan çok güzel, sağlam bir uzun hikayesi var, grafikleri çok güzel, oynanışı çok güzel, karakterler çok iyi yapılmış (Wheatley canımı sıkıyordu gerçi), Soundtrack çok sağlam. Oyun sadece Tek Oyunculu değil Çok Oyunculu İki Kişi oynanabiliyor. Benim aşırı oynadığım zamanlarda arkadaşlarım Portal 2 oynamak istemiyorlardı ama yıllar sonra oynadım ve 3 kere co-op'u bitirdim, tek oyunculu versiyonunu o kadar çok bitirmiştim ki saymadım bile, o kadar çok oynamıştım ki abimin hesabında 200 saati var benim sayemde. Bağımlısı olmuştum o zamanlar gerçi şimdi ara sıra giriyorum. Umarım oyunun hikayesini unuturum da bi daha girip oynarım. 

Neyse benim hikayeye çok girdim ben, oyunu aşırı derecede öneriyorum. Eskiden benim aldığım zamanlarda 31 liraydı şimdi 18 liraya düşmüş. Bazen indirime girip 4 liraya düşebiliyor. Bence gidin alın pişman olmazsınız.

Size bir de oyunun en iyi müziklerinden birini atıyorum.

Surement mon jeu préféré ! Il y a tellement de choses a dire :
- des mécaniques de jeu géniale
- Une histoire intérressante
- Un bon jeu d'acteur avec un bon doublage français (ce qui est rare)
- De l'humour
- Un mode coop très réussi
- De la réflexion
- Un univers dans lequel on se plonge très facilement
et encore pleins de choses.
Je conseille mille fois ce jeux !

Having not played portal 1 or 2 till recently I can not say how impressed I was with both of these games. While 1 was a great, 2 brought with it a fun and interactive story and a good set of puzzles that at times really made you think.

Nothing brought me so much joy as opening a mega hatch and being greeted by the grandeur that is Aperture science.

Fun game with semi-challenging puzzles that won't hurt your brain. If you're not a fan of or familiar with FPS games, then some of the puzzles may be unsolvable for you due to a lack of accurate reflexes.
Great game, forces you to think a little bit. Great editor!

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games ever made and everyone should play it. It will change your life forever...

Long story short. I love this game. I personally think it's brilliant. The puzzles are awesome, the characters are great, and a big upgrade from the previous game is the length. Where the original was only about 2-3 hours long, this game's single player campaign alone beats that time. After you've finished singe player, you can have even more fun with co-op.
When you finally have beaten everything in Portal 2, you can go to the workshop and download all kinds of awesome community levels. I adore this game, and I really hope that we may see Portal 3 one day (only if Valve could count to three...)
Realy good, highly suggest.

[h1] Что я могу сказать об этой игре? [/h1] 

Portal 2 - это игра, заставляющая думать, работать мозг игрока на полную мощность (над некоторыми уровнями я сидела по полчаса, а то и больше)
Это игра, где логика совмещается с очень забавным юмором (шутки ГЛаДОС про вес героини просто бесценны)
Это игра - вопрос. Когда играешь, выполняешь задания, но даже до конца игры толком не уверен, кому можно доверять. Что происходило в этой лаборатории? Почему я должна помогать кому-то? 
Это игра с милыми деталями и ачивками (особенно понравился небольшой "монолог" спасенной турелли в начале игры с некоторыми маленькими отсылками к сюжету)
Это игра с обилием интересных уровней, не позволяющими заскучать.
Это игра с очень классным co-op режимом (хотя он, конечно, немного проще, чем сюжетная линия)
Не смогу промолчать и про отличный саундтрек,[spoiler]особенно зацепила песня туреллей в конце[/spoiler]

[i] В заключение хочется сказать: игра восхитительная! Мне она действительно безумно понравилась 
Это просто must-play для всех! [/i]

It's been out a fair few years now but only recently got round to playing it, brilliant puzzle game and improves on the earlier portal title. Music composition is solid as usual, puzzles are challenging enough that you have to think seriously for some and Stephen Merchant's voice acting as Wheatley is great and will make you laugh several times throughout the game. The only possible knock on this game would be the few odd areas where you can get stuck and become unable to escape however, these places are few and far between and with regular autosaves it's a very minor inconvenience that you likely wont come across. So overall i would recomment this game to anyone who has played the previous game, or people who enjoy puzzles and physics 9/10.

In my opinion, this is the best puzzle game ever created. Along with a funny storyline and excellent voice acting, this game does everything a sequel is supposed to do. Ever since I played the first Portal back on the Orange Box on console, I fell in love with the style and feel that it delivers. Portal 2 is a masterpiece, as you would expect from Valve, if you haven't played it then you're missing out. It's very hard to say anything bad about this game other than there is no Portal 3. This game looks gorgeous on Source so I can't imagine how good it would look on Source 2. Buy this game, it is definitely worth your money.

This game is a great storyteller and uses it's resources to it's advantage. I've never been as invested in a game as I've been with this one as the music direction and sound design makes you feel like you're in the same room with Chell, GLaDOS, and Wheatley completing the sometimes difficult yet understandable test chambers. This game greatly improves on the first game due to the fact that the environments have had amazing upgrades both in the normal test chambers and the old Aperture Science areas and the characters themselves look much better (specifically Chell) than the first game's models. If a third game is ever made at some point in the future for whatever reason, I will be buying it on launch day.
